plot: As the veil breaks and an apocalyptic sandstorm engulfs Midnight, the Midnighters rally to protect the town from demonic forces.

Now that Fiji knows the name of the demon, Colconnar. The rest of Midnight is gearing up to find out how they can stop the coming Apocalypse. As demons start coming , they are trying to find a way to save everyone. . As the veil is becoming thinner more supernatural events are occurring. Trying as they might to evacuate all the rest of people a sandstorm blows more demons into town. Will the inhabitants of Midnight make it through the night? Can Fiji ever be safe?—Movie Dude
